name: Rary
description:
Rary - thys is a casual game using physics where you control the ball. The meaning of the game is to score as many points as possible, one point is awarded when you touch colored blocks, and with each touch they decrease in size, which slightly complicates the task. Also on the playing field bright red blocks appear in a random place, beware of them, because if you touch them, you will lose and have to start all over again. And how many points can you collect?

Features:

- Interesting gameplay

- Relaxing graphics

- Pleasant music

- Use of physics
